title: submit a request
body: Hi im trying to submit a request a ticket to riot some questions. And all i get is this popping up as failure. Request not found. You do not have access to request #0. It may have been solved or deleted. Please HELP ME ASAP

replies.body: This is a really strange error, would you happen to have a screenshot of it?  It sounds like you're trying to reach an inaccessible ticket.  I'm curious if the link to your ticket number may have been cut off?

This is what comes up im properly sending a ticket. Request not found. You do not have access to request #0. It may have been solved or deleted. and below this is stands.
 
Your tickets

No requests found.

Thanks for the info!  There might be a caching issue causing this or even an extension.  I recommend clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), running incognito, or trying another browser entirely.

If all else fails, you can also reach us through email via support@riotgames.com!
Thank you for your help it worked! lets how i get unbanned xD
This dont work then is there some other way to talk about my question?
